certificates.title: PHP Object Oriented Programming Basics
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in a comprehensive training on PHP Object Oriented Programming covering fundamental OOP concepts including classes, objects, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism. The training focused on modern PHP programming practices and building maintainable, scalable applications using object-oriented design patterns.

certificates.title: Introduction to Laravel Framework
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in training covering Laravel framework fundamentals including MVC architecture, routing, middleware, Eloquent ORM, Blade templating, authentication, and best practices for building modern web applications using one of PHP's most popular frameworks.

certificates.title: Building Your Portfolio with AWS
certificates.description: Attended the webinar 'Community Ignite Series Episode #65: Building your portfolio with AWS' which covered how to leverage Amazon Web Services to host and showcase professional portfolios. The session provided insights on cloud deployment, AWS services for web hosting, and best practices for creating an impressive online presence using AWS infrastructure.

certificates.title: Malicious Software Awareness
certificates.issuer: DICT - Regions IV-A and IV-B Cybersecurity Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in CALABARZON Cyber Talks focusing on Malicious Software Awareness, Avoidance and Mitigation. The webinar covered various types of malware, threat detection, prevention strategies, and best practices for protecting systems and data from malicious software attacks. Conducted via Zoom platform by DICT Regions IV-A and IV-B Cybersecurity Bureau.

certificates.title: Paperless Proofreading: Effective Use of Review Tools on MS Word
certificates.description: Participated in a webinar focused on paperless proofreading techniques and effective use of review tools in Microsoft Word. The session covered collaborative editing features, track changes, comments, version control, and digital workflow optimization for document review and editing processes.

certificates.title: Python Programming Fundamentals
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in comprehensive training on Python Programming Fundamentals covering core concepts including variables, data types, control structures, functions, modules, and basic data structures. The training provided a solid foundation in Python programming and its applications in various domains.

certificates.title: Basic Web Development Using WordPress
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in training on Basic Web Development Using WordPress. The session covered setting up and configuring WordPress, customizing themes and layouts, installing and managing plugins, creating and organizing pages and posts, and applying basic SEO techniques. It also covered best practices for website design, responsiveness, and content management to build professional and user-friendly websites.

certificates.title: PC Formatting Using VirtualBox
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in training on PC Formatting Using VirtualBox covering virtual machine setup, operating system installation, disk partitioning, formatting procedures, and system configuration in virtual environments. The training provided hands-on experience with virtualization technology and system administration tasks.

certificates.title: Cybersecurity Awareness
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau
certificates.description: Participated in a webinar on Cybersecurity Awareness covering essential security concepts, threat identification, safe browsing practices, password management, data protection, and awareness of common cyber threats. The session emphasized the importance of security mindfulness in both personal and professional digital environments.

certificates.title: Tech Trends: Artificial Intelligence (Intermediate Session)
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Industry Development Bureau & Analytics Association of the Philippines
certificates.description: Participated in the Tech Trends webinar series focusing on Artificial Intelligence at intermediate level. The session explored current AI trends, machine learning concepts, practical applications, and emerging technologies in the AI landscape. Conducted via Zoom Video Conference and Facebook livestream with a total of 2 webinar hours.

certificates.title: Intermediate Level of Software Engineering
certificates.issuer: DICT - ICT Literacy and Competency Development Bureau (Coursebank)
certificates.description: Successfully completed and received a passing grade in Intermediate Level of Software Engineering, a course of study offered by Department of Information and Communications Technology. The course explored key software engineering concepts such as system design, software development life cycle (SDLC), object-oriented programming principles, and project management practices. It focused on improving coding efficiency, teamwork, and problem-solving skills for building scalable and maintainable software applications.
